divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my portch smokeing a cig after waching a movie that ended just befor 2am and was sareing at the sky to the north west of foyil oklahoma cuse the trees block the rest of my sight of the sky but while i was smokeing a cig i seen i thought at the time was the lights of an airliner but after 2sec i knew it wasent. the white light looked like someone with a flashlight waveing it back and forth makeing the light dim and brighting but not flashing... it looked light the light was on the bottem but it looked like it was turning and makeing the bottem i suppose face my way n made the light seem brighter. it looked like it was banking and i was getting a glimps of the bottem while it was about to dim out and fade away.
Summary: Pure white light. Faster then a plane but slower then a shooting star
